entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with rain this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
